infoList.outcome: Decline in new diagnoses by 25-40% every week

infoList.intervention: Universal masking of health care workers and patients in the Mass General Brigham hospital
infoList.outcome: Decline of new diagnoses among health care workers by 3.4% every week

infoList.intervention: Mandatory mask wearing in public spaces (e.g. public transport, shops)
infoList.outcome: Decline of new diagnoses among population by 1.32% every day

infoList.population: 124 Households of diagnosed cases comprising 335 people
infoList.intervention: Self reported mask wearing by victim/victim's family member prior to infection
infoList.outcome: Mask wearing reduced risk of secondary infection by 79%
Mask wearing reduced risk of infection by 70%

infoList.intervention: Self reported mask wearing by contact at time of high-risk exposure to case
infoList.outcome: Always having used a mask reduced infection risk by 77%
